Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 15th overall pick, by Cleveland in 1988...
Had first career hit on 9/8/1989, off Jay Franklin (MIN)...
Hit first career homerun on 9/21/1989, off Bob Knepper (BOS)...
Had 5 hits with 6 RBI against New York (A) on 10/3/1990...
Won Rookie of the Year Award in 1990, hitting .330 with 6 HR, 67 RBI...
Injured on 4/26/1991 with a Sore Back, out for one week...
Injured on 6/8/1992 with a Pulled Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Was selected to the 1992 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Baltimore on 8/25/1992...
Had 26-game hitting streak snapped on 5/15/1993...
Was selected to the 1993 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 5 RBI against Boston on 6/9/1994...
Was selected to the 1994 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/14/1994, hitting .583 with 2 HR, 9 RBI...

Drove in 6 runs against Boston on 4/20/1996...
Was selected to the 1996 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 1997 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against Boston on 8/22/1997...
Had 5 hits with 6 RBI against Chicago (A) on 6/1/1998...
